entries.title: Yellen Warns Default Would Cause 'Widespread Damage' to U.S. Economy

entries.title: Woman Misses Hearing for Terrorizing Jewish Temple to Harass It Again

entries.description: Lake, who lost the governorship to Katie Hobbs, a Democrat, refused to concede and led legal efforts to challenge the midterm election results.

entries.title: We Might Be Driving a Rise in Two-Headed Sharks
entries.description: A two-headed bull-shark embryo, found in the Gulf of Mexico, is the result of "the incomplete division of a single fertilized egg," an expert told Newsweek.

entries.title: 'Age Is Just a Number': 90-Year-Old Grandma Shares Her Fitness Journey
entries.description: This 90-year-old, Edna May Giordano, works out every day. So, if you feel like giving up on a fitness goal, this grandma may be the inspiration you may need.
